meanings.definition: A large African antelope with long spiraling horns.
meanings.sent1: The bubalis grazed peacefully in the savanna.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful bubalis at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The bubalis tried to dance but its long horns got in the way.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the spiraling horns of a bubalis.
meanings.sent5: The bubalis's horns were like elegant corkscrews twisting in the air.

meanings.definition: The genus of antelopes to which the hartebeest belongs.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the bubalis to learn more about antelopes.
meanings.sent2: The bubalis is closely related to the hartebeest.
meanings.sent3: In the antelope family reunion, the bubalis was the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: The bubalis genus is a treasure trove of antelope diversity.
meanings.sent5: The bubalis genus shelters many unique antelope species.
